channel.title: Server Ip help
channel.description:
Hey well i'm trying to run a new server my first server ever running.
I need help with changing my server ip address so that people can log on. I run the client it runs on my server ip address from no-ip. I uploaded it to rune-locus and it worked (says server is online) but when i try logging in from another computer it doesn't work, it says error connecting to server. (Same ip as mine)
Any ideas? Also it's galaxyx.forummotion.com if you want to try logging on server will be up for a long time till i get a vps once i figure this problem out.

item.title: Server Ip help
item.dc:creator: @rossy319 rossy319
item.description:
@rossy319 wrote:

Hey well i’m trying to run a new server my first server ever running.
